tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Taylor Swift - We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together - Luke Conard Official Music Video Cover
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Purchase on iTunes! itun.es SUBSCRIBE for more videos like this! bit.ly SHARE ON FACEBOOK: bit.ly Watch Joey's Version! youtu.be Subscribe to Joey! youtube.com BLOOPERS to this video: youtu.be Get this song on bandcamp! lukeandjoeymusic.bandcamp.com Music produced by Luke Conard Video...

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: your﻿ good mate :)
really good work﻿ guys!
At the end﻿ he touched his butt lol an she was a bitch anyway ^.^
oh i get ya﻿
Tyalor is much prettier.﻿ The video is ok but the that was really the gayest fight.
LIKE IF YOU THOUGHT SHE WAS TAYLOR SWIFT. I﻿ did.
hilarous ending ﻿ lol

Hey guys!! Its my sisters birthday in a week and I put﻿ this video up of her singing and for my present to her i want to get the video to have 2,000 views! She is an amazing singer and﻿ loves it more than anything. It would mean so much to me and her if you guys would take a couple minutes to search "caroline carlson i wont give up". And if you like it subscribe!!
I though this﻿ was taylor at the first
I thought it was Taylor lol﻿
grl looks like﻿ tay?
GAYYYY﻿
she was a hoe.....fo﻿ sho.... lol
Nah.. I don't like Megan Nicole's﻿ one. One she's not a great singer and there's not much emotion in here voice. It just sounds normal, not angry or anything :)
gay. ﻿
nice star wars belt﻿ man....
do they really have to put﻿ on lipstick when singing? -_-
hey everyone﻿ ,﻿ if you see this﻿ comment﻿ ,﻿ can you please check out﻿ my﻿ cover of﻿ this﻿ song.﻿﻿ you guys﻿ would﻿ really enjoy it.﻿﻿ pretty please !!!

Hey guys!! Its my sisters birthday in a week and I put﻿ this video up of her singing and for my present to her i want to get the video to have 2,000 views! She is an amazing singer and loves it more than anything. It would mean so much to me and her if you guys would take a couple minutes to SEARCH "CAROLINE CARLSON I WONT GIVE UP". And if you﻿ like it subscribe!!
jake and﻿ matty
